attributes.action: Move every one having to pay the Csa to the new fairer system.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
in March 2003 a new fairer system became law, 15% of your wages to your child.
The Csa and govt are refusing to move people off the old system to the new.
So people who are paying Csa, but their child was born before 2003, are paying nearly treble to what others are.
Its unfair, and Mp's and govt because they are raking it in, don't want to know.
its ruining peoples lives, and totally unfair
